text:
Hi there!

I am working on a quote template. In particular, on a 'child' template of the CMS theme 'Modern'.
I am having problems with the translation modules. When I apply custom translations to certain modules, they are not applied to the quotes created. In the module preview it does apply the changes, but not on the quotes (linked to the Modern CMS child).

I change the language of the quote template linked to the CMS child theme to reset all the quote values and put the corresponding language back.
After doing these steps, the translation is still not updated.
I don't know if the problem comes from the cache, or if there is a problem between the 'parent'and 'child' template.

 Does anyone have this problem?
Hi Carlos, have you tried to unmount the Quote Template in the Settings and add it again?
I also think that Quotes that are already created might not be effected by your changes by design, so i would try to create an entirely new Quote
OK! I'm going to try what you say. I'm also looking at cloning the whole child to work on a totally independent clone because I have several issues... Thanks!
